briefTitle: A Phase III Clinical Study to Evaluate SYN023's Efficacy and Safety

armGroups.label: Control Group: Human Rabies Immune Globulin (HRIG)+Rabies Vaccine

interventions.name: SYN023
otherNames: A Humanized Anti-Rabies Molecular antibodies cocktails

interventions.name: Rabies Vaccine
otherNames: Freeze-dried Rabies Vaccine for Human Use (Vero Cells)

outcomeMeasures.title: Rabies Virus Neutralizing Activity (RVNA) of Geometric Mean Concentration (GMC) at Study Day 8
outcomeMeasures.description: Rabies Virus Neutralizing Activity (RVNA) was assessed using Rapid Fluorescent Focus Inhibition Test (RFFIT).

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Probable or Confirmed Rabies Cases
Rabies Virus Neutralizing Activity (RVNA) of Geometric Mean Concentration (GMC)
outcomeMeasures.description: Rabies Virus Neutralizing Activity (RVNA) was assessed using Rapid Fluorescent Focus Inhibition Test (RFFIT).

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With Rabies Virus Neutralizing Activity (RVNA) ≥0.5 IU/mL
outcomeMeasures.description: Rabies Virus Neutralizing Activity (RVNA) was assessed using Rapid Fluorescent Focus Inhibition Test (RFFIT).

outcomeMeasures.title: Area Under the Efficacy Curve for the Geometric Mean Concentration (GMC) of Rabies Virus Neutralizing Activity (RVNA)
outcomeMeasures.description: Rabies Virus Neutralizing Activity (RVNA) was assessed using Rapid Fluorescent Focus Inhibition Test (RFFIT). Area Under the Efficacy Curve for the GMC of RVNA from Study Day 1 to Day 15 after administration (AUEC1-15)
